record.dc:title: 100MG31 Hiwassee Island Site 37MG31, Meigs Co., TN. 37MG31 - Earth mound. Feature 39B, Level E. Stairway leading up to the south slope of the pyramidal mound designated as Feature 39, and a section of the south slope of this mound. Length of ramp is 21.5', width 5.5' and angle of inclination ca.45'. Direction east.
record.wpa:narrative: This ramp is made of very hard-packed sandy clay and runs from the base of Level E to the top of Feat. 39 pyramidal mound at an angle of Ca. 45 degrees. The top surface has been cut into fairly regular, well made steps. The ramp fans out slightly at the base so that it is wider than at the top. The ramp shows no evidence of patching or of erosion although it was exposed to the weather. This ramp forms the main approach to Feat. 39 pyramidal mound.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustrations on file at the institution. See also photographs 93MG31 [fhm01208], 94MG31 [fhm01209], 95MG31 [fhm01210], 98MG31 [fhm01212], and 99MG31 [fhm01213].
